original: 河東聞喜人，毌丘甸之女，其祖父為毌丘儉。毌丘儉兵敗後，被夷三族，但因母親荀氏家族與司馬家有姻親關係，而逃過一劫，更因此牽動修改株連刑罰。
text: Hedong Wen is gratifying, the daughter of Wuqiudian, whose grandfather is Wuqiujian. After Wuqiujian was defeated, he was killed by the Yi tribe, but because his mother Xun family was in-laws with the Sima family, he escaped a catastrophe, which affected the revision of the conviction penalty.
